Create.AlbumInfo2: Varmista ettei albumia ole jo tietokannssa. Sinun täytyy antaa ainakin yksi nimi ja artisti.
Create.UnableToCreateAlbum: Albumin lisäys ei onnistu. Tarkista virheet ja yritä uudelleen.

Details.NoTracklist: Ei kappalelistaa annettu. Kuka tahansa rekisteröitynyt käyttäjä voi täyttää listan.
Details.ReviewAlreadySubmitted: You have already submitted a review in this language. Multiple reviews in the same language are not allowed.
Details.ReviewLoginToReview: Log in to post a review

Edit.BaNames: Primary name (in one or more languages)
Edit.BaPictureInfo: Allowed types: {{0}}. Maximum size is {{1}} MB.
Edit.TrAddTrackHelp: Note: do not write the artist name or track number into the track name. Artists will be specified separately.
Edit.TrTrackNameHelp: Click track name to edit artists.
Edit.ChangesAreSavedImmediately: Changes on this tab are saved immediately.
Edit.ConfirmMoveToTrash: Are you sure you want to move this album to trash?
Edit.PiPicturesGuide: Note that the main picture is edited on the "Basic Info" tab. Please only upload pictures relevant to this album, nothing else.
Edit.PvIntro: You can use this page to add advertisements or crossfades related to this album.
Edit.PvSupportedServices: Supported services: YouTube, NicoNico, Vimeo, SoundCloud, Piapro, Bilibili, Creofuga and Bandcamp (tracks only).
Edit.BaDiscTypeExplanation: If unsure of which type to use, try to find out how the artists themselves call the album. For more elaborate descriptions, please refer to Wikipedia, Discogs or Musicbrainz.
Edit.DiNote:
If the album contains multiple discs you may define extra properties for those discs here.
				You may specify disc name and type. Name is optional - if not specified, the default "Disc #" will be used, where "#" is the disc number.
